def has_television_nearby(remote_control:item):
    # Function to check if there is a television close to the remote control
    symbol nearby_tv=exists tv: item : is_television(tv) and close(tv, remote_control)
    return nearby_tv

behavior use_remote_control(remote_control:item, television:item):
    body:
        achieve_once inhand(remote_control) # Pick up the remote control
        achieve is_on(television) # Turn on the television

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind remote_control: item where:
            is_remote_control(remote_control) and id[remote_control]==2052
        # Bind to the specific remote control with known ID 2052
        
        if has_television_nearby(remote_control):
            bind television: item where:
                is_television(television) and close(television, remote_control)
            use_remote_control(remote_control, television)
            # Use the remote to turn on the television
        else:
            # Since the television is not confirmed to be close, observe the area around the remote
            observe(remote_control, "Check if there is a television nearby")

behavior use_remote_on_tv(remote_control:item, tv:item):
    body:
        achieve close_char(char, remote_control)
        # Ensure the character is close to the remote control
        achieve_once inhand(remote_control)
        achieve close_char(char, tv)
        # Ensure the character is close to the TV
        achieve is_on(tv)
        # Turn the TV on using the remote control

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind remote_control: item where:
            is_remote_control(remote_control) and id[remote_control]==2052
        # Select remote control with ID 2052
        bind tv: item where:
            is_television(tv) and close(remote_control, tv)
        # Select a television that is close to the remote control
        use_remote_on_tv(remote_control, tv)

def has_television_nearby(remote_control:item):
    # Determine if there is a television close to the remote control
    symbol tv_nearby=exists tv: item : is_television(tv) and close(remote_control, tv)
    return tv_nearby

behavior use_remote_to_turn_on_tv(remote_control:item, tv:item):
    body:
        achieve close_char(char, remote_control)
        # Approach the remote control
        achieve_once inhand(remote_control)
        # Hold the remote control
        achieve close_char(char, tv)
        # Ensure the character is close to the television
        achieve is_on(tv)
        # Turn the television on

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind remote_control: item where:
            is_remote_control(remote_control)

        if has_television_nearby(remote_control):
            bind tv: item where:
                is_television(tv) and close(remote_control, tv)
            use_remote_to_turn_on_tv(remote_control, tv)
        else:
            observe(remote_control, "Check if there is a television nearby")
            # Observe the remote_control for any nearby televisions

def is_television_nearby(remote:item):
    # Function to check if a television is near the remote control
    symbol television_near=exists tv: item : is_television(tv) and close(tv, remote)
    return television_near

behavior pick_up_remote(remote:item):
    body:
        achieve_once inhand(remote)
        # Pick up the remote control

behavior turn_on_television(remote:item, television:item):
    body:
        achieve is_on(television)
        # Use the remote control to turn on the television

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind remote_control: item where:
            is_remote_control(remote_control) and on(remote_control, couch_352)
        # Select the remote control which is on the couch
        
        if not is_television_nearby(remote_control):
            observe(couch_352, "Check if there is a television nearby")
            # If television is not nearby, inspect the surroundings of the remote control for a tele
vision
        
        bind television: item where:
            is_television(television) and close(television, remote_control) 
        # Select the television which is close to the remote control
        
        pick_up_remote(remote_control)
        turn_on_television(remote_control, television)

def has_tv_nearby(remote_control: item):
    # Determine if there is a TV nearby the remote control
    symbol tv_nearby=exists tv: item : is_television(tv) and close(tv, remote_control)
    return tv_nearby

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind remote_control: item where:
            is_remote_control(remote_control)

        if not inhand(remote_control):
            achieve_once inhand(remote_control)
        
        if not has_tv_nearby(remote_control):
            foreach tv: item:
                if is_television(tv) and not visited(tv):
                    observe(tv, "Check proximity of the television")

        bind tv: item where:
            is_television(tv) and close(tv, remote_control)
        
        achieve is_on(tv)
